meanings.definition: A pair of muscles located in the jaw region.
meanings.sent1: The pterygoids help us chew our food.
meanings.sent2: The dentist explained the importance of the pterygoids for jaw movement.
meanings.sent3: The pterygoids decided to take a break from chewing today.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was as strong as the pterygoids in her jaw.
meanings.sent5: The pterygoids are like little workers tirelessly grinding away at our meals.

meanings.definition: The pterygoid process, a bony projection in the skull.
meanings.sent1: The pterygoids are part of the intricate skull structure.
meanings.sent2: The doctor pointed out the pterygoids on the X-ray.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous student drew funny faces on the pterygoids in the anatomy book.
meanings.sent4: The pterygoids stood out in the skull like ancient pillars.
meanings.sent5: The pterygoids in the skull were like hidden gems waiting to be discovered.
